1) Sanjeewa Arunasiri saha Gayashani wetha, mama hithanawa ubala denna mee comment eka kiyawai kiyala. Me pinthoora tika dekka gaman bokkatama weduna, as walata kadulu doree galanna gaththa, koi tharan kadulu pihidagaththath thava kadulu mathu wuna. Ubala wage porawal thaama lankawe innawa kiyala,mee loke ithuru wela innawa kiyala denagaththa sathutata wenna athi. Magul uthsawaya gaththa heti dekka gaman theruna ubala denna maranin passe dev lowa yana dennek kiyala. Me vage aththa deyak karanne 0.00000001% wage real porawal. Mata hithena vidihata manamaali dasa laksha, kooti prakootiyakinwath hoyaaganna beri kenek, ubala denna harima waasanaawanthai. Ubala denna cake kepuwe nethi wunata, karagaththa pinama athi jaathi jaathith dev sepa labanna

ane amu metto, mee wage hoda deyakwath agaya karanna hedichcha namak daagena wareng.  lankawe pin baleeta kaalen kaaleta ela porawal bihiwenawa.  isssara dutugemunu rajjuruwo  den kaale mahinda mee denna rata beeragaththa dennek  thava lanakwe nama thiyapu porawal hitiya, mama cricket pissek nisa kiyannam > Aravinda, Sanath, Arjuna, Kaluvitharana, Roshan Mahanama, Vass, Murali wage evun cricket peththen lakanwe nama thibba. Un cricket gahanakota gehuwe lankawa gena hitala. Mee ganziyata sama karanan mungen passe ekek meter wune. Budu dahama peththen gahthtoth, Ven Gangodawila Soma, ven Panadure Ariyadhamma thamange nam galee ketuwa wage weda karala apawath wune. Mee wedding couple ekath mama mee uda sadaham karapu aya wage amathaka nowena deyak. Enisa, ubata ada maha pare behela yanna puluwan gathiyak udaa karala dunna mahindata satheekin hari salakanna egena ganin. Mee jeevethe uba hithana vidihata wadaa gemburui. Enisa lindee inna mediyek wenna epa. Eliyata awith lokee dihaa balapan. Eliye awwa paayala. Linde thiyena adunra eliye nehe. Uba kaara support da kiyala mama wedak nehe, mokada 1 + 1 = keeyada kiyala danne nethi ubala wage evungen ewwa ahalath wedak nehe. Hema ekaama salli gahanawa, eeth salli gahala hari, nogahala hari Ranil + Sirisena karapu dee mokakda?
